download_setence_1: Download to watch international movies, movie series
easy_content: MSub YoteShin is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use. With its clean and intuitive interface you can easily navigate and find the content you want to watch and you can watch the latest subtitled movies and series in real time.
android_phone_content: Can be used on Android 4.0 and above versions.
android_tv_content: Can be used on Android TVs.
sports_android_content: Can be used on Android 4.0 and above versions.
vlc_content: VLC media player is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as discs, devices, and network streaming protocols.
mxad_content: MX Player is a media player available on a number of platforms, most notably Android. The app boasts that it can play every major video format.
mxpro_content: MX Player is a media player available on a number of platforms, most notably Android. The app boasts that it can play every major video format.
network_content: If you are looking for the right application for you to play your videos, then you should consider installing this application called Network Stream (Video) Player.
contact_content: If you want to give us advices or if you have something difficult about our application, you can send us your advice or difficulties freely.
